ruling: - The effect of [[Dreamsprite]] is not optional so if you have at least 1 other monster on the field when [[Dreamsprite]] is attacked, the attack target is changed to your other monster. This is also true if [[Dreamsprite]] is attacked when face-down.

- If your [[Dreamsprite]] equipped with [[Ring of Magnetism]] is chosen as an attack target, and you control another monster, the effect of [[Dreamsprite]] will still change the attack target to your other monster.

- If you control [[Dreamsprite]], [[The Legendary Fisherman]], and [[Umi]] is on the field, [[Dreamsprite]]'s effect can still change an attack target to [[The Legendary Fisherman]] because it is not being targeted with an attack, but is being targeted with a monster effect.

- If you control two [[Dreamsprite]]s and one is attacked, you cannot continue to switch the attack target between the two [[Dreamsprite]]s because the effect of [[Dreamsprite]] says that you must calculate damage on the new target.
